channel.title: Need Delta Barrage Fix Help Is Appreciated
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2cmkjzl.jpg[/img]
Ok, when i'm stood 3 squares away from the player, he can still hit me. Althrough he's froze. When i stand 4 squares away (On the X in the picture) he can't attack me. Any help please :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 13, 2009, 01:28:39 am[/size][hr]help please :(?
